meanings.definition: The act of mixing or blending different elements together.
meanings.sent1: The admixture of colors created a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent2: The admixture of ingredients in the recipe made it delicious.
meanings.sent3: The admixture of silly jokes and serious topics kept the audience entertained.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was an admixture of kindness and determination.
meanings.sent5: The admixture of scents in the garden was overwhelming.

meanings.definition: A substance that has been mixed or blended with another substance.
meanings.sent1: The cake batter needed an admixture of flour and sugar.
meanings.sent2: The concrete was strong due to the admixture of cement and gravel.
meanings.sent3: The admixture of flavors in the smoothie surprised her taste buds.
meanings.sent4: His speech was an admixture of truth and exaggeration.
meanings.sent5: The admixture of fragrances in the perfume was captivating.
